Posts.Content: MaatIsis wrote: Hello, I'm a newbie supporting my Mother's diagnosis on 12/24/2013 for mass in breast and lymph biopsy on 01/06/14 (positive). Her Pet scan reports the cancer has not spread beyond the breast and underarm. She had her first chemo treatment today (02/03/14). I have read articles and it seems the trend is surgery to shrink/kill the cancer cells prior to surgery. Can anyone speak to their experience? Any guidance offered would be greatly appreciated. Thank you Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: IDC; Chemo Before Surgery MaatIsis encyclias
